items.description: Implementation of the content and technological initiatives development strategy in line with the company's mission. Leadership of the content professionals team: providing guidance, motivation, and support to achieve high-performance results. Creation of high-quality and captivating content for the company's website and other digital channels. Ensuring content quality control. Analysis and improvement of content production processes to optimize workflows and enhance outcomes. Collaboration with other company departments to achieve strategic and operational objectives. Adherence to budgets and timelines for effective resource management.

items.title: description
items.description: Planning and selecting topics for articles, photographic materials, etc. Choosing visual elements, photographs, and illustrations for use. Interaction with authors and ensuring timely submission of materials. Collaboration with designers to create attractive layouts. Monitoring the printing and distribution of the publication. Coordinating the project team's work and involving relevant experts. Ensuring communication and coordination between the editorial team, designers, and other stakeholders. Duties related to participating in exhibition organization: Ensuring timely submission of all necessary materials from participants. Developing and coordinating the visualization of exhibition stands. Planning the event's network and engaging appropriate specialists for implementation. Providing necessary equipment, furniture, and materials. Attracting participants to the exhibition. Participating in the planning of entertainment activities. Providing informational support for the exhibition program. Resolving ongoing issues and supporting participants and visitors.
